meta.description: Adds 13 new zombies to the game, each with their own peculiarities
meta.long_description:
This is a port of the outdated 1.7.10 mod, Mo'Zombies, which features 100% of the original content.

It was created to fill the need in the +1.12.2 of Minecraft for a simpler zombie mod, like the original version, but that had greater peculiarities in relation to the behavior of the mobs and their drops and, mainly, to finish the Survivor mob


## Mob list:
- Survivor
- Zombie Notch
- Zombie Herobrine
- Zombie Dwarf
- Zombie Chef
- Nether Zombie
- Zombie Miner
- Zombie King
- Zombie Knight
- Zombie Pirate
- Zombie Pa
- Zombie Cyborg
- Zombie Creeper
- Disco Zombie
meta.name: Mo' Zombies Wave
